sources.title: Aesop's Fable: Foiling the Fox (1950)
sources.description: The Dingbat, guarding the sheep flock, has to resort to many daffy antics and tricks in order to keep Wily Fox from adding a little lamb to his dinner menu. The battle goes in favor of both for a while, until the Dingbat manages to cage the fox. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/aesops-fable-foiling-the-fox-1950/

metadata.Plot: The Dingbat, guarding the sheep flock, has to resort to many daffy antics and tricks in order to keep Wily Fox from adding a little lamb to his dinner menu. The battle goes in favor of both for a while, until the Dingbat manages to cage the fox.
